frontCases.name: Nelly Shopping App
frontCases.desc: A digital shopping experience for iPhone and iPad enhanced with community features to share and discuss latest fashion trends.

frontCases.name: Retts Plus
frontCases.desc: Saving lives by supporting emergency personnel in critical decision-making during medical emergency situations.

frontCases.name: Mat.se Driver App
frontCases.desc: On-time front door grocery deliveries through real-time positioning and waypoint-to-waypoint navigation.

allCases.name: Forces of Freedom
allCases.desc: Game user interface for Forces of Freedom, a 5 vs 5 real-time tactical combat game for mobile and tablet devices.

allCases.name: Tennis Watch
allCases.desc: The first tennis app designed for Apple Watch. Turns your watch into a score tracking device and brings in-depth match statistics to your iPhone.

astronauts.name: Andreas Kaltenbach
astronauts.desc: Co-founder and COO. Full-stack developer and tech lead with over 12 years of experience.

astronauts.name: Mikael Hellqvist
astronauts.desc: Partner and CTO. 20 years of creating digital experiences, mostly iOS nowadays.

astronauts.name: Viktor Hesselbom
astronauts.desc: Partner and Lead Web/Unity developer. Experienced frontend developer with the mindset of a technical artist.

astronauts.name: Pontus Börjesson
astronauts.desc: Digital Designer in pursuit of creating engaging digital experiences, always keeping the user in mind.

astronauts.name: Oskar Jönsson
astronauts.desc: Mobile Developer in his mid-twenties with some years into iOS, Android and React Native.

astronauts.name: Martin Egri
astronauts.desc: Lead Backend Developer who has been building cloud-based services and platforms for more than six years.

astronauts.name: Mattias Lundell
astronauts.desc: Mobile developer with extensive experience in Android and iOS. Android is his platform of choice.

astronauts.name: P-A Gustafsson
astronauts.desc: Co-founder and CEO. Over 17 years as product manager and designer across five industries.
